summary: "Evermore" is Taylor Swift's ninth album, released in 2020 as a surprise. It's like a sister album to her previous record, "Folklore," and was made with musician Aaron Dessner. The album has a unique sound with rock, folk, and pop influences, and tells stories about love and life. It was well-liked by critics and fans, and even got nominated for a Grammy. "Evermore" was a big success, reaching number one in many countries and selling over a million copies in its first week.
title: Evermore
